value.name: 1 hospitalized, 2 buildings struck by gunfire in drive-by shooting
value.description: A man was shot and two nearby buildings were hit by gunfire rounds fired from a vehicle Thursday night in Logan Heights, authorities said. The incident was reported at about 8:20 p.m. on Ocean View Boulevard near Franklin Avenue.
